PropertyValue.Value: select basi_maintain_area_info.maintain_area_id, basi_maintain_area_info.maintain_area_name, basi_maintain_area_info.maintain_area_address, basi_maintain_area_info.phone, basi_maintain_area_info.dute_person, case basi_maintain_area_info.status when '00' then '正常' when '01' then '已删除' end status, basi_maintain_area_info.update_date, basi_maintain_area_info.update_time from basi_maintain_area_info
